TopicTitle: KSP Interstellar Extended 1.11.18 Crash at loading save

Articles.Content:
HI I don't know if this is the right spot but I can not use KSPI E Mod 1.11.18 on KSP 1.2.2 It will load to the main menu but tring to load a save it crashes the error in the log is "Write to location 00200000 caused an access violation."  I can post the log file if needed. Will do the samething with or with out other mods .

Running Win 7 32bit 

KSP 1.2.2 Steam Install

 

 

Im running these mods on the side

GN Drive 4.4

AmpYear V1.4.5.0

Kerbal Planetary Base Systems 1.3.11

KerbalEngineer 1.1.2.8

SCANsat-v16.11

W.A.R.P. Drive By NovaSilisko

 

 

PS. as long as I delete the warpdrive folder in game data everything else works

10 hours ago, Help93 said:

"Write to location 00200000 caused an access violation."

Running Win 7 32bit

It usually means you're running out of memory. Is there any reason you still use a 32 bit OS? That basically limits the available memory on your system to 4GB, including the graphics card.
Running crappy laptop, lol. Thanks for responding guess I need to run ksp on a better computer.
